title: Elementary Social Studies Education Strategies Using Critical Thinking and Immersive Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of elementary social studies concepts and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers, competency-based approach and metaverse technology for problem-solving education centered on societal issues

learning_goals: Learners can analyze community issues and propose solutions through VR simulations.
Learners develop critical thinking and social responsibility by completing competency-based tasks.
Learners can conduct peer assessments and provide feedback using digital collaboration tools in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
